results.deck: RED Entertainment (aka Red Company) is a Japanese game developer and publisher founded in 1976.
results.description: Founded in 1984, Red Company changed its name to Red Entertainment in 2000, with the first title to be released under the new brand name in 2002. Red Entertainment is the developer of two long-running Japanese RPG series released for various systems, Sakura Taisen and Tenga Makyou. They do however publish and develop many other games, as well as a few manga and anime books.
results.name: Red Entertainment Corporation
